abstract: Choreographer Karole Armitage collaborated with biology Prof Paul R Ehrlich to produce dance piece On the Nature of Things, which explores climate change; piece, which will be performed by her dance troupe Armitage Gone! Dance, will premiere at American Museum of Natural History.
lead_paragraph: The choreographer and Dr. Paul R. Ehrlich, a professor of biology, collaborated on this work about climate change, set to premiere March 25, at the American Museum of Natural History.

headline.main: Karole Armitage’s New Dance Work Traces Steps for a Greener Path
headline.print_headline: Tracing Steps for a Greener Path

snippet: The choreographer and Dr. Paul R. Ehrlich, a professor of biology, collaborated on this work about climate change, set to premiere March 25, at the American Museum of Natural History.
